languages.text: "Стой, {name}!" {n}Арджента потрясенно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Он — наш друг и слуга Императора, зачем вредить ему?"
"{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"
languages.original_text: "Стой, {name}!" {n}Арджента потрясенно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Он — наш друг и слуга Императора, зачем вредить ему?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's servant! Why would you seek his death?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，等等！”{n}阿洁塔一脸震惊地看着你。{/n}“这个人是我们的朋友，也是帝皇尽忠职守的仆人！你为什么打算杀害他？”
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: “{name}，等等！”{n}阿洁塔一脸震惊地看着你。{/n}“这个人是我们的朋友，也是帝皇尽忠职守的仆人！你为什么打算杀害他？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、待て！」{n}アルジェンタは驚いた表情でこちらを見た。{/n}「この男は私たちの仲間であり、皇帝の忠実な従僕！なぜ彼を殺す必要がある？」
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、待て！」{n}アルジェンタは驚いた表情でこちらを見た。{/n}「この男は私たちの仲間であり、皇帝の忠実な従僕！なぜ彼を殺す必要がある？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Espere, {name}!». {n}Argenta te mira atónita.{/n} «¡Este hombre es nuestro amigo y un sirviente fiel del Emperador! ¿Por qué querría matarlo?».
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Espere, {name}!». {n}Argenta te mira atónita.{/n} «¡Este hombre es nuestro amigo y un sirviente fiel del Emperador! ¿Por qué querría matarlo?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: ", wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

languages.text: « {name}, attendez ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en vous lançant un regard stupéfait.{/n} Cet homme est notre ami et un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur ! Pourquoi voulez-vous le tuer ? »
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: « {name}, attendez ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en vous lançant un regard stupéfait.{/n} Cet homme est notre ami et un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur ! Pourquoi voulez-vous le tuer ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, wartet!" {n}Argenta blickt dich entsetzt an.{/n} "Dieser Mann ist unser Freund und ein pflichtbewusster Diener des Imperators! Weshalb solltet Ihr seinen Tod wollen?"
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, wartet!" {n}Argenta blickt dich entsetzt an.{/n} "Dieser Mann ist unser Freund und ein pflichtbewusster Diener des Imperators! Weshalb solltet Ihr seinen Tod wollen?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Dur {name}!" {n}Argenta, şaşırmış bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu adam bizim dostumuz ve İmparator'un hayırlı bir hizmetkârı! Neden onu öldürmek isteyesin ki?"
languages.original_text: "{name}, wait!" {n}Argenta looks at you with a stunned expression.{/n} "This man is our friend and the Emperor's dutiful servant! Why would you seek his death?"

traits.locale_text: "Dur {name}!" {n}Argenta, sana şaşkın bir ifadeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Bu adam bizim dostumuz ve İmparator'un hayırlı bir hizmetkârı! Neden onu öldürmek isteyesin ki?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
